aboutpara: Diligent software engineer with 9+ years of experience in commercial application and software development. Eager to develop and build innovative and cutting-edge business solutions for the impressive suite of clients within its global reach. In previous roles, slashed downtime by 30% and ensured 90% on-time project completion. Also identified and dealt with a significant process bottleneck that boosted data efficiency & encapsulation by 100% when resolved.
